Package Engine.Physics

Class EntityPhysics

java.lang.Object
Engine.Physics.Physics
Engine.Physics.Movement
Engine.Physics.EntityPhysics
public class EntityPhysics extends Movement
This class defines methods that help to organise how objects behave in the physics simulation. It is different to the CharacterPhysics class as these objects can be locked and can't be moved by the user
Author:
Joshua Dowlman
